Name: Platform_Name
Name_Note: This will be deprecated in future versions. Use 'MatchName' instead.
MatchName_Note: Generally used for matching against Player name in UDP data. Case sensitive.
RaceNumber_Note: Mandatory field, used for matching drivers.
Team_Note: Can be used to specify team for the driver. Mainly used when matching along with RaceNumber.
DisplayName_Note: Name to be displayed in HUD. Mandatory field. Used as a fallback field if LastName is not provided.
FirstName_Note: Optional field for First Name of the driver. Not used at the moment, but will likely be used in future updates.
LastName_Note: Optional field for Last Name of the driver. If provided, this will be used in HUD instead of DisplayName.
Notes: Additional notes about the driver entry. Feel free to use them to your liking.
Other_Notes: Consider this as a template entry. You can use it as a reference when adding new entries. Variable position doesn't matter. Only 'RaceNumber' and 'DisplayName' fields are mandatory. Note that 'notes' fields are just for your reference and do not affect functionality.
